attributes.action: Introduce legislation making professionals, responsible for the protection of children, liable to criminal prosecution when their inactions or negligence have directly contributed to the death of a minor
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Professionals who fail to act to protect those children they have responsibility for the protection of, or who prevent actions which could remove a child from a situation which later proves to be fatal should be made to take responsibility. If found guilty of professional negligence resulting in the fatality of a minor, they should immediately loose their job and should be liable to face criminal prosecutions if their actions could have saved the child's life and they chose not to act or prevented others from acting on the child's behalf.
